name: Flappy Spider (ChocolateCookieBro)
description:
You play as a spider who was in its web until it got blown out by the wind. Since there is no ground the spider must jump around to avoid obstacles or it will be knocked into the abyss. Space to jump.

bg music - https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6
